item.title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus fantasy hockey panic or patience
item.description: The Caps, Flyers and Leafs rise this week, while the Wild, Devils and Senators fall off a bit.

item.title: Inclusion of Parekh, Misa is a step in right direction for Canada at World Juniors
item.description: Has Hockey Canada finally learned from past mistakes -- and could that result in a gold this time around?

item.title: Our guide to every Week 15 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
item.description: Who can improve their chances of making the playoffs? And who is likely out? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 15 game.

item.title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks MVP candidates and picks the winner
item.description: Let's make the MVP cases for 15 players -- including a ranking of the top five.

item.title: As responsibilities evolve, MLB manager salaries still lag behind top coaches in other sports
item.description: From new hires to award winners, big paydays continue to allude most skippers. What gives?
